subject: Remove unnecessary comments that repeat what code already says
body:
Keeps comments that explain *why* (overlay stacking, alignment fallback chain)
and JSX organizational comments. Removes ~60 comments that just restate
function names, variable names, or obvious operations.

https://claude.ai/code/session_016gkiEHfLZuxcENumd4QSz1
title: Remove unnecessary comments that repeat what code already says
